EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-01-MS EoS - Thank You.Completed Survey Thank You - Completed Meeting Tha
EmailTemplate.subject: Your reward for completing a meeting with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. We hope you enjoyed your personalized demonstration! As a gift for your time, your $50.00 Amazon.com gift card is enclosed below.
For a bit more context, check out:
- The Forrester Wave TM, Cloud Cost Monitoring and Optimization, Q2 2018 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/forrester-cloud-cost-monitoring-and-optimization/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4faAAA]]> - The Gartner Research Note, How to Build An Intelligent Data Center <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/intelligent-data-center/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ffAAA]]> - AWS or Azure? How Turbonomic Enables Data-Driven Decisions <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/which-cloud-webinar-v-1/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fkAAA]]>
I hope you find this information helpful as you continue your optimization journey. {{my.Gift 50:default=}}
Regards, Megan
